roleset.name: weather phenomenon,
roleset.note: SNOW-V NOTES: Comparison with 'rain'. Member of VNcls weather-57. (from snow.01-v)

role.descr: entity, location snowed on; snowy place

example.name: classic weather construction
example.text: He was mildly surprised to find it was snowing.

example.name: all args
example.text: The big purple clouds snowed ice cream flakes on the children .

roleset.name: having snow around, maybe in the air
roleset.note: SNOWY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from snowy.01-j)

example.name: EXT
example.text: So far so good ! I am at my gate and at the moment the flight is on time !! It 's soooo snowy though it seems crazy to me that it is n't delayed ! I ll keep yo u posted if anything changes !

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: Here and there the trail is snowy with tiny white petals
